content: Lifestyle General Asked by MujimoroAsked on 28 Jun 2019Looking back now, what do you regret having spent so much money on?Nothing much, just a general question...2 answersAnswerBump0

Jennifer GohLevel 4. ProdigyUpdated on 28 Jun 2019Brand new technology!
New versions are often replaced by another brand-new version within the next few months and the price of the "new version" you've just bought drops significantly.It is just a hype and not worth the extra money! :[ (cue to overpriced Apple product...)Hope the above helps a little! :)2 comments2

Jolene TanLevel 2. RookieAnswered on 28 Jun 2019Tuition!!!
I regret forcing myself to study just for the sake of it and not truly learning & discovering what I enjoy. Wasted lots of money on tuition when the real issue was the mindset towards studies, anyone feel me haha0 comments0
